name: AJAX Admin Menu Editor
author: Luke Hertzler

sections.description:
Easily reorder your admin menu items on the user and blog level with simple drag & drop operation.

Menu ordering is automatically saved in the database by user and site.

Based on user, the plugin will load their own unique menu preference.

This plugin is a standalone feature of the Zeus Admin Theme plugin. To bundle this feature as well as ajax admin searching, hide admin menus, improved admin ui, and more download Zeus here
sections.installation:
Quick Setup Steps

  1. Upload admin-menu-reorder directory or extract ajax-admin-menu-editor.zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Reorder admin menu items by drag & drop
